channel.title: Comments on: My customized controller and the 2 I used.

item.title: By: pokefan950
item.dc:creator: pokefan950
item.description: Guessing you just swapped the buttons on the red one with the ones in the white one
item.content:encoded: Guessing you just swapped the buttons on the red one with the ones in the white one

item.title: By: roncopenhaver13
item.dc:creator: roncopenhaver13
item.description: Did you also put the other parts together to make a 2nd custom controller? Orange with white back & gray button set?
item.content:encoded: Did you also put the other parts together to make a 2nd custom controller? Orange with white back & gray button set?
